title: Property Editor displays layout item properties when switching to Master Page Viewer
description: When switching to the Master Page Viewer, the Property Editor is still displaying the properties of layout items. This behavior is incorrect as the Property Editor should only show the properties relevant to the selected item in the Master Page Viewer.
OB: The Property Editor should only show the properties of the selected item in the Master Page Viewer.
EB: The Property Editor is showing the properties of all layout items instead of only the selected item in the Master Page Viewer.
SR: To reproduce the issue:1. Create a new report and insert a label.2. Select the label. (The Property Editor should show only the label's properties)3. Switch to the Master Page Viewer. The Property Editor should update to only show the properties of the selected item in the Master Page Viewer.
